short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly save and search web pages you need to remember with Dewey - your personal web memory.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dewey is your ultimate tool for saving and searching web pages effortlessly. Whether you're conducting research, gathering resources for a project, or simply need to remember important information, Dewey has you covered. With Dewey, you can quickly save any web page and retrieve it whenever you need it.

Key Features:

- Instant Save: Save web pages with a single click. Dewey captures the content, title, and description, making it easy to find later.
- Effortless Search: Quickly search through your saved pages with powerful search functionality. Find exactly what you're looking for in seconds.
- Seamless Access: Access your saved pages anytime, anywhere. Dewey ensures your important information is always at your fingertips.
- Privacy and Security: All your saved pages and searches are securely stored on your computer. Your data never leaves your device, ensuring complete privacy.

Dewey is designed for anyone who needs to keep track of important web pages. From students and researchers to professionals, developers, and casual users, Dewey simplifies the way you remember and access web content. Developers will find Dewey particularly useful for remembering documentation pages, code snippets, and solutions from forums like Stack Overflow. No more bookmarking countless pages or losing track of vital information. Let Dewey be your personal web memory assistant.
